title: (x) Abbeye Cistercienne - Spellbound (?) {Jan Sandvik}
content:
Someone e-mailed me this font sample and so far I have had no luck spotting it in any of my books or samples.   
   
Any ideas? Thanks ![Abbe Cistercienne sample](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516141958im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/23675.jpg)
author: bowfinpw

comments.content:
It might be a font called "Spellbound" from WSI ( [http://www.weatherlysystems.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516141958/http:/www.weatherlysystems.com/)) the only sample I could find is at   
 [http://fonts.ontheweb.com/fonts/spellbound\_\_1.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516141958/http:/fonts.ontheweb.com/fonts/spellbound__1.html)

Jan,   
Thanks. From what you can see it looks consistent, but it's too bad there is no full preview for that one. WSI isn't my favorite supplier as some of you might remember from earlier rants, but I did pass this info along to the ID requestor. He can decide if he wants to risk his own $7.95 to find out if this is really the same font.
